welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Westlake, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of city life. Get ready to explore our beautiful lakes, friendly community, and vibrant downtown. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Hopkins International Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by major airlines such as United and American.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Hopkins International Airport primarily serves international flights operated by airlines such as Delta and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and agree to the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminal.
